titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the special rule for treatment of foreign trade income of a FSC attributable to military property.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7099)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/10/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the special rule that limits the amount of foreign trade income derived from the disposition of military property which a foreign service corporation ]may treat as exempt foreign trade income to 50 percent of the amount which would otherwise be treated as such income.
